roleset.name: taking a vote (not the piece of paper! That is NOT eventive!)

roles.note: Most instances of 'ballot' in nouns are not going to be eventive. Please refer to the examples, watch out for light verbs, and be very careful!

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Julia Gillard has beaten her predecessor Kevin Rudd in a ballot for the federal Labor leadership by a margin of 73 votes to 29 .
example.note: This is a good example of an eventive instance. Here, 'ballot' is synonymous with 'vote'.

example.name: NOT EVENTIVE!! Call this .YY
example.text: On Indian gaming , I 'll mention that the Navajo Nation put casino gambling on the ballot twice .
example.note: This instance refers to a piece of paper. DON'T TAG!!!
